basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli AB94012 (MIC>100 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa AB93066 (MIC>100 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus thuringiensis AB92037 (MIC=25 µg/ml), Bacillus subtilis AB91021 (MIC=50 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus AB94004 (MIC=25 µg/ml), Methicillin-resistant coagulase-negative S. aureus (MIC=25 µg/ml).
